ovdesc.p: This file contains details of local transaction codes used in the local clearing system.
All transaction codes should be loaded, as any transaction code entered in the system from the incoming tape will be verified against this file.
Information concerning the transaction code must be specified which will then determine whether a Funds Transfer is to take place and whether or not to report the transaction.

desc.p: Contains the T24 Transaction code to be used when posting transactions in the Generic accounting interface with this external transaction code.
Where DEBIT.CREDIT.BOTH is set to debit or credit, this must match the value of DEBIT.CREDIT.IND in the TRANSACTION record.
